title: MrZeroxs' 2v2 Tournament
body: Hello everyone, I'm here to let you know that I'll be holding a 2v2 Howling Abyss tournament, it's free and it will be held at 9:30AM AWST on Sunday (5/11/17). The prize as of now is $5 RP. If interested add me on LoL "Mr Zeroxs" and PM me... Best of luck and I hope to see you there!

replies.body: Not to sound greedy but $5 is a joke of a prize for getting randoms to join
